Control.name: CombatMetrics_RowTemplate
Control.OnMouseUp: CMX.AddSelection( self, button, upInside, ctrl, alt, shift )

Control.name: CombatMetrics_BuffRowTemplate
Control.OnMouseUp: CMX.AddSelection( self, button, upInside, ctrl, alt, shift ) if button == MOUSE_BUTTON_INDEX_RIGHT then CMX.BuffContextMenu( self, upInside ) end

Line.name: $(parent)Line
Line.OnInitialized: local color = ZO_ColorDef:New(GetString(SI_COMBAT_METRICS_MAGICKA_COLOR)) self.color = color self:SetColor(color.r, color.g, color.b, color.a)

Control.name: $(parent)Saved
Control.OnInitialized:
local scrolllist = GetControl(self, "PanelScrollChild") scrolllist:SetResizeToFitPadding(0, 20)
local label = GetControl(self, "HeaderName") label:SetText(GetString(SI_COMBAT_METRICS_SAVED_FIGHTS))
